thread.title: What influenced the decision to keep troops in Afghanistan

author: pbs.org
title: What influenced the decision to keep troops in Afghanistan
text: The longest-running war in American history will go on even longer than expected. Hari Sreenivasan speaks to the Washington Postâ€™s Greg Jaffe about what prompted President Obama to change course and decide to leave troops in Afghanistan.
